text: On 4 December 1971, the Ulster Volunteer Force placed a bomb at the entrance to a pub in New Lodge, Belfast, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom.Bomb demolishes crowded Belfast pub It exploded, killing 15 people, injuring 17 others and destroying the building. == References == Category:1971 in Europe Category:1970s crimes in Europe Category:1970s disasters in Europe Category:1970s explosions Category:Attacks on bars Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Northern Ireland Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 1970s Category:History of Belfast Category:Building bombings in the United Kingdom Category:Explosions in Northern Ireland Category:Mass murder in Northern Ireland Category:Mass murder in the 1970s Category:Terrorist incidents in the 1970s Category:The Troubles
